snippet: Space in the Saugerties, N.Y., house the artist Harvey Fite lived in while creating his 37-year labor of love, Opus 40, is now available to rent on Airbnb.
lead_paragraph: Space in the Saugerties, N.Y., house the artist Harvey Fite lived in while creating his 37-year labor of love, Opus 40, is now available to rent on Airbnb.

headline.main: Inside an Environmental-Art Masterpiece — for $200 a Night
